name: Play Die Reroll
description:
Roll an entire battlefield out of dice! Choose your bullets carefully and defeat robots using the right numbers!

In Play Die Reroll you hunt down deadly robots in first-person, shooting specific dice from your revolver to match each robot's weakness. You'll have to be quick on your toes to keep yourself alive, and after clearing the arena of VIP robots, you'll have to roll another battlefield and do it again!

Sourced Assets:
  • Lots of textures and main table mesh from Quixel Megascans
  • Robot model chopped up and animated from a prop from What Remains of Edith Finch https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/ef-twins
  • Room background is Anniversary Lounge HDRI, Greg Zaal, polyhaven.com
  • Revolver by Q_x, https://opengameart.org/content/three-guns-nagant-steyr-valmet
  • Sound effects from Dracue's "2D SciFi Shooter", https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/2d-scifi-shooter
  • Light Machine Gun sound from https://opengameart.org/content/light-machine-gun
  • From https://gamesounds.xyz/ :
    • Home / OpenBundle / Bullet Heaven / Bead.mp3
    • Home / 99Sounds / [99Sounds] InterSpace / Oneshot / Oneshot-03
    • Home / 99Sounds / [99Sounds] InterSpace / Oneshot / Oneshot-09
    • Home / 99Sounds / [99Sounds] InterSpace / Oneshot / Oneshot-12
    • Home / Kenney's Sound Pack / Digital Audio / laser-4
    • Reload: https://gamesounds.xyz/Sonniss.com%20-%20Game%20Audio%20Monthly%20-%204/GameBurp...
Known Issues:
  • Enemies can get stuck in structures
  • Exploding enemies can become inaccessible
  • Required enemies can, in rare occasions, be skipped during level placement
